subject: p17163861
Findings: The patient is status post sternotomy. A dual-lead pacemaker/ICD device appears unchanged with leads again terminating in the right atrium and ventricle, respectively. There is patchy left basilar opacity, also obscuring the left lateral costophrenic sulcus, but somewhat decreased. Elsewhere, the lungs remain clear. There are no pleural effusions or pneumothorax. Small osteophytes are present throughout the visualized thoracic spine.
